RelatedSentence: But before that , the organising committee would be hosting similar commemorative events including observance at Red Hill ( Maibam Lokpa Ching ) on May 29 , commemoration of Battle of Motbung on June 7 , Lift of Imphal Siege / Milstone 109 on June 22 , Battle of Bishnupur on June 12 and Silchar Track on June 25 .
